thread.title: Mary Hibbard
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Mary Hibbard

author: Mary Hibbard
title: Mary Hibbard
text: As Senior citizens in the frozen North (Wisconsin), we spend many hours doing your beautiful puzzles! I prefer bright colors and sharp contrast (that comes with old age!)... also purchased smaller puzzles for our young grandchildren... some are very educational... hope you get more Nativity Scenes next Christmas... and bible stories, like Noah's Ark.
